name: Claidna
aura: Increase Ally HP in Dungeons by 40

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Sleep] debuff for 1 turn. 

Fills this Champion’s Turn Meter by 15% if the [Sleep] debuff is placed.
skills.name: Touch of Slumber
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc:
Has a 75% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff and a [Leech] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns. 

Also heals all allies by 20% of this Champion’s MAX HP.

skills.desc: Places a [Block Debuffs] buff and a [Revive on Death] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
skills.name: Otherworld Infusion

skills.desc: Has a 30% chance of completely blocking the incoming damage of the first hit of an attack. Occurs once per turn.
